Package it.cnr.isti.hpc.dexter.spot

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArticleContextExtractor
    ContextExtractor for each label extract the context (text around the the label)
    ContextExtractor
    A ContextExtractor extract the context of a spot (i.e., text around the the spot)
    ContextExtractorTest
    ContextExtractorTest.java
    DocumentFrequencyGenerator  
    Spot
    A spot consists of: the mention (i.e. the common anchor used to link the entities) the list of entities related to the current mention in the knowledge base the frequency of the mention: how many times the mention occurs in the collection (as link or simple text) the link frequency of the mention: how many times the mention occurs in the collection as a link to an entity the idf score of the mentions The spot is not document related, but collection related.
    Spot.Parser
    A record parser for tsv encoded spots.
    SpotMatch
    SpotMatch contains all the additional informations regarding a spot matched in a particular position of the text.
    SpotMatchList
    Represents a list of SpotMatch
    SpotReader
    SpotReader class iterates over a list of spots given two files: a spotSrcTargetFile containing a list of spots extracted from the anchors in the wikipedia dump.
    SpotReader.SpotFrequency
    Contains the text of a spot and its document frequency in the collection.
    SpotReader.SpotFrequencyParser
    Parse a line containing the encoded version of a SpotFrequency object.
    SpotReader.SpotParser
    read a spot-src-target file parsing only the spots.
    SpotReader.SpotSrcTarget  
    SpotReader.SpotSrcTargetParser  
    SpotReaderTest
    SpotReaderTest.java
